SELECT BOARD_SEQ , BOARD_RE_REF , BOARD_RE_LEV , BOARD_RE_SEQ , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_SUBJECT , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_HITS , DEL_YN , INS_USER_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS INS_DATE , UPD_USER_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS UPD_DATE FROM board.MyBOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
